title: T-Rex
description:
A Tyrannosaurus rex, a massive, meat-eating dinosaur with huge jaws, tiny arms, and a long tail. Depicted as a green tyrannosaur standing on its hind lefts facing left, often with a textured back, sharp teeth, and clawed toes.

May be used to represent various dinosaurs, including raptors. See also ðŸ¦• Sauropod.

May also be used to call a person a dinosaur, i.e. imply that they are old-fashioned or out-of-touch with modern sentiments.

Google’s T-rex used to look somewhat like a velociraptor, though the design has since changed. Samsung’s T-Rex was previously red, Microsoft's brown, and Facebook’s only a green head with open jaws.
apple_vendor_description: The T-Rex emoji on Apple devices is a formidable yet stylized creature, designed with Appleâ€™s signature bold outlines and glossy 3D shading that give it a playful, toy-like quality. Its rounded form and bright, engaging colors make this prehistoric giant approachable, while the subtle highlights suggest a polished, tactile surface. This iconic dinosaur, as seen on Appleâ€™s vibrant displays, often evokes themes of power, the past, or a sense of playful, primal energy.
